values: 看见；看得见；看出；观看（比赛、电视节目、演出等）；有视力；见到；目睹；观察；认为；理解；弄清；考虑；了解；领会；识别；审视；照顾；拜访；探望；会见；遇见；与（某人）待在一起；陪同；护送；送；遭遇；经历；确保；保证；与…打赌；与…下相同的赌注；预见；预料；想象；设想；参见（用于书籍、文章等引用时）；为…发生的时间；为…发生的地点
主教教区；主教的职位（或权限）；教座；主教辖区；教座

word_mean_info__list.difference: 社交上的正式用语，指无目的、礼节性的短暂拜访，访问者与被访问者之间一般只有社交或公务关系。
多指在计划之外或事先未打招呼的偶然、顺便访问。也可指参观。
常用词，含义广泛，既可指接受他人来访，又可指去访问他人。
正式用词，强调出于工作需要的访问，也指亲戚朋友间的看望。
侧重以客观的态度进行观察。
指用眼睛跟随某物，以便对每一个变化、运动等进行观察。

word_group.brief_definition: (作解释时说)你看, 你知道, 要知道
看电影；去看电影；看场电影
很快再见, 一会见, 回见
处理, 注意, 确保
被看作；被视为；被看作为
亲自看, 亲自了解(以核实)
送行, 送别；告别；赶走

bilingual.target: 你看见了多少个风筝呀？
它们帮助我更好地看见你。
哇！你看见黄果树瀑布了吗？

bilingual.source: A baby panda is pink and it cannot see.
bilingual.target: 熊猫宝宝是粉红色的，不能看见。

bilingual.source: Did you see that old photograph that I found?
bilingual.target: 你看见我找到的那张老照片了吗？

bilingual.source: "See? I was here, like this," it said.
bilingual.target: “看见了吗？我就在这里，像这样，”它说。

list.abstract: see（英 [siː]，美 [siː]），英文单词，作动词为看到；看见；领悟。作名词为主教教区。短语搭配有I see（我明白了）。例句为“Try to see things from your offenders angle.（试着从犯罪者角度看问题。）” 该单词的过去式为saw，过去分词为seen，第三人称单数为sees，现在分词为seeing，不及物动词类近义词为absorb、appreciate、read，及物动词类近义词为look、behold。see和look的区别为前者指看见，后者侧看“重”的动作。

阿拉善SEE生态协会（Society of Entrepreneurs & Ecology，SEE），是一个由企业、其他组织、自然人出资成立并由企业家领导并参与治理的公益性和非营利性的社团组织，位于内蒙古自治区阿拉善盟，成立于2004年6月5日，现任会长周洲。 该协会的宗旨是：改善和保护阿拉善盟的生态环境，包括并不限于减缓或遏制荒漠化的发生，与此同时，促使和引领中国企业家承担更多生态责任与社会责任。该协会组织机构主要有会员代表大会、理事会、监事会等，下设专题委员会、议题委员会；截至2021年，协会有855名会员。该协会的业务范围为：阿拉善地区环保为基础，业务局限于阿拉善地区。

yingyinNormal.en: The future, I can see it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我能看见未来。

yingyinNormal.en: Tell me what do you see?
yingyinNormal.zh: 告诉我，你看见什么了？

yingyinNormal.en: Do you see those stars there?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看见那边的星星了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. Oh my God. I didn't even see you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 天哪，我刚才没看见你。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you see what they're doing in there?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看见他们正在干什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Skipper, look! I see you, Private.
yingyinNormal.zh: 老大，看啊！看见你了，菜鸟。

yingyinNormal.en: No, they won't. They won't see me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，他们不会的他们不会看见我的。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies》

yingyinNormal.en: That's where I'm gonna be able to see you. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也方便我能看见你。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh God, maybe he won't see us. Richard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 天哪，也许他没看见我们，理查。

yingyinNormal.en: He lies. Tell the truth! What do you see?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他撒谎。给我说实话，看见什么了？

yingyinNormal.en: You didn't see him take the scalpel? Nobody saw him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你没看见他拿手术刀？没人看到。

yingyinNormal.en: Come here. I want you to see. You can have a closer look. You see that? See?
yingyinNormal.zh: 过来，我想让你看看，让你靠近点看，看见没？看见了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: No, no. Rachel, don't get it. He'll see us. No, yeah. The groom cannot see the bride.
yingyinNormal.zh: 瑞秋，别开门，他会看见。新郞不能看见新娘。

yingyinNormal.en: What do you see?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看见什么了？

yingyinNormal.en: I see it. Eternity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我看见了。永生。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy, what will we see in the countryside? We'll see birds and trees and flowers and bees. Dine-saw.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们会在郊外看见什么呢？会看见鸟，树木，花朵和蜜蜂。恐龙！

yingyinNormal.en: Lordy! Can you even see in these? Yes. Yes, I can! I can. I'm blind!
yingyinNormal.zh: 老天爷！戴这东西还能看见吗？是，我能看见。我瞎了！

yingyinNormal.en: What does this mirror do? I see what I desire. I see myself holding the Stone. But how do I get it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 喔，这面镜子干什么用的？我看见我的欲望，我看见我拿着魔法石，可我怎么得到？

yingyinNormal.en: Did anyone see my leopard print skirt? I saw a leopard headband on the stairs. That's it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谁看见我的豹纹裙子了？我在楼梯上看见一条豹纹头巾。那就是了。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's look through the telescope. I can see Daddy. The telescope makes everything look closer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们从望远镜里看吧。我能看见爸爸了。望远镜能让你看见远处的东西。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 看到; 看见; 看出
目睹; 经历; 见证

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 看到；看见；领悟；理解；看望；探望；意外遇见；护送；与…下同样赌注

sense_info_list.zh: 看到; 看见; 看出

examination_example.sentence: Enjoy the beauty of the world around and keep the eyes open to <highlight>see</highlight> the possibilities before you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 享受周围世界的美丽，睁大眼睛看看你面前的可能性。

examination_example.sentence: In the Internet age, it is particularly easy to <highlight>see</highlight> the resentment that has always been hidden within American society.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在互联网时代，人们特别容易看到一直隐藏在美国社会内部的怨恨。

examination_example.sentence: This is a subtle form of peer pressure: we unconsciously imitate the behavior we <highlight>see</highlight> every day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一种微妙的同侪压力：我们不自觉地模仿每天看到的行为。

examination_example.sentence: Brexit is <highlight>seen</highlight> by some as an opportunity to reverse a recent trend towards the UK importing food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些人认为，英国脱欧是扭转近期英国进口食品趋势的一个机会。

examination_example.sentence: We can choose to <highlight>see</highlight> failure as "the end of the world".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们可以选择将失败视为“世界末日”。

examination_example.sentence: Working with your hands is <highlight>seen</highlight> as almost a mark of inferiority.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 用双手工作几乎被视为劣等的标志。

sense_info_list.en: be the time or place when something happens; experience or witness
sense_info_list.zh: 目睹; 经历; 见证

examination_example.sentence: Society <highlight>sees</highlight> a rise in overall well-being.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 社会的整体幸福感有所提高。

examination_example.sentence: While the rest of the world takes the lead, notably China and Europe, the United States is also <highlight>seeing</highlight> a remarkable shift.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当世界其他地区，特别是中国和欧洲领先的时候，美国也正经历一个显著的转变。

examination_example.sentence: Some relatively poor European countries have <highlight>seen</highlight> huge improvements across measures including civil society, income equality and the environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些相对贫穷的欧洲国家在公民社会、收入平等和环境等方面的措施上取得了巨大进步。

examination_example.sentence: We <highlight>see</highlight> that the program is associated with a 30 percent reduction in deforestation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们得知该计划与森林砍伐减少30%有关。

examination_example.sentence: Only recently have they come to <highlight>see</highlight> the vital part forests will have to play in storing carbon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 直到最近，他们才意识到森林在储存碳方面必须发挥的重要作用。

examination_example.sentence: Trust me, you'll be surprised to <highlight>see</highlight> how much people are willing to share if you just ask.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相信我，你只要是问一下，你就会惊讶地发现人们愿意和你分享多少事。

examination_example.sentence: Travel on a London bus and you'll quickly <highlight>see</highlight> how this works with drivers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乘坐伦敦公共汽车旅行，你会很快就会理解它是如何配合司机工作的。

examination_example.sentence: This is just my opinion, but I don't <highlight>see</highlight> how we will make that deadline.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这只是我的看法，但我不知道我们将如何在最后期限前完成。

examination_example.sentence: You will <highlight>see</highlight> that mental health has been there to direct you through all your difficult decisions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你会发现心理健康一直在指导你完成所有困难的决定。

examination_example.sentence: They have troubles <highlight>seeing</highlight> a financial future and they are quite risk averse.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们很难看到未来的金融前景，而且他们非常厌恶风险。

examination_example.sentence: The threat of nationalisation may have been <highlight>seen</highlight> off for now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国有化的威胁目前可能已经消除。

examination_example.sentence: Use your lunch and coffee breaks to meet up with colleagues you don't always <highlight>see</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 利用你的午餐和工间喝咖啡休息时间与你不常见到的同事见面。

examination_example.sentence: Care was taken to <highlight>see</highlight> that all subjects, friends and strangers, were taken from the same population.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 悉心确保所有的实验对象，不管是朋友还是陌生人，都选自同一个族群。

sense_info_list.en: to find out or decide sth by thinking or considering
have a romantic relationship with someone
take someone somewhere by going there with them

word_usage.usage: 表达“看到某人做某事”，see sb. do sth.是指看到了动作的整个过程，强调动作的完整性、真实性；see sb. doing sth.指看到一部分过程，强调瞬间动作以及动作的进行性。
see sth through是指把（任务、工程等）进行到底、坚持完成；而see sb. through是指帮助或支持某人度过……。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 认为; 看作; 视为

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 被看作；被视为；被看作为
被看作；被视为；被看作为

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 看到；看见；领悟；理解；看望；探望；意外遇见；护送；与…下同样赌注

examination_example.sentence: They will <highlight>see</highlight> the complexity of science.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们会看到科学的复杂性。

examination_example.sentence: Books can also allow children to <highlight>see</highlight> diversity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 书籍也可以让孩子们看到多样性。

examination_example.sentence: Webber expects that we will <highlight>see</highlight> more digital humans on screen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 韦伯猜想，我们将在屏幕上看到更多的数字人类。

examination_example.sentence: I can <highlight>see</highlight> that.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我看得出来。

examination_example.sentence: They may fail to <highlight>see</highlight> the cultural biases of their business partners.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可能看不到商业合伙人的文化偏见。

examination_example.sentence: The interior minister, Christophe Castaner, visited the cathedral on Tuesday afternoon to <highlight>see</highlight> the extent of the devastation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Christophe Castaner周二下午视察了这座大教堂，了解了地震破坏的程度。

sense_info_list.zh: 认为; 看作; 视为

examination_example.sentence: It seems, can't always be expected to comply with procedures that are not <highlight>seen</highlight> as useful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但似乎不能总是期望员工遵守那些被视为无用的程序。

examination_example.sentence: The first cause was company culture, which was <highlight>seen</highlight> by employees as enabling poor management practices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第一个原因是公司文化，员工们认为这种文化助长了糟糕的管理实践。

examination_example.sentence: We <highlight>see</highlight> it as a professional skill instead of a personal capacity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们把它看作是一种专业技能，而不是个人能力。

examination_example.sentence: It is <highlight>seeing</highlight> an automation revolution.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它正在见证一场自动化革命。

examination_example.sentence: Many of them have <highlight>seen</highlight> a decline in road-death rates.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中许多人的道路死亡率有所下降。

examination_example.sentence: Happily, art and design have <highlight>seen</highlight> a recent increase.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 令人高兴的是，艺术和设计类课程的人数最近有所增加。

sense_info_list.en: be the time or place when something happens

examination_example.sentence: They reported <highlight>seeing</highlight> structural changes in the musically trained children's brains, both locally and in the pathways connecting different parts of the brain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们报告说，在接受音乐训练的儿童的大脑中，无论是在局部还是在连接大脑不同部分的路径中，都看到了结构变化。

examination_example.sentence: We don't have to look further than our own communities to <highlight>see</highlight> the devastating impact of automation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们不必看得比我们自己的社区更远，就能见证自动化的毁灭性影响。

examination_example.sentence: Instead, some in Africa and Asia are <highlight>seeing</highlight> their first light bulbs illuminated by the power of sunlight stored in batteries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，一些非洲和亚洲人见证了他们的第一个电灯泡是由存储在电池中的太阳能点亮的。

word_usage.usage: see, watch, look at都有“看”的意思。see侧重“看”的结果，而后前者侧重“看”的动作和过程。

see表“看见”时，是瞬间的动作，一般不用进行时；而watch也表示“看”，可用于进行时。
我临窗站着，望着人们匆匆走过。
误 I stood by the window, seeing people passing by in a hurry.
正 I stood by the window, watching people passing by in a hurry.

see既可用作不及物动词，也可用作及物动词；其宾语后接不定式时，不带to。see处于被动语态时，后面所接的不定式带to。
有人看见那贼走进一家杂货店。
误 The thief was seen come into a grocery.
正 The thief was seen to come into a grocery.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 看到；看见；领悟；理解；看望；探望；意外遇见；护送；与…下同样赌注

examination_example.sentence: "We don't <highlight>see</highlight> the move happening in our lifetime because of the funding. "
examination_example.sentence_trans: “由于资金的原因，在我们有生之年，我们不会看到这一转变发生。”

examination_example.sentence: Why did Donna Barr say they wouldn't <highlight>see</highlight> the plan carried out any time soon?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么唐娜·巴尔说他们短期内不会看到计划实施?

examination_example.sentence: I'm looking through my files now, and I <highlight>see</highlight> that the delivery was this morning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我现在正在查看我的文件，我发现是今天早上送货的。

examination_example.sentence: I think I might try that big new supermarket on the other side of town and <highlight>see</highlight> what they have.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想我可能会去城镇另一边新开的那家大超市弄清他们有什么。

examination_example.sentence: Forests in countries like Brazil and the Congo get a lot of attention from environmentalists, and it is easy to <highlight>see</highlight> why.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像巴西和刚果这样的国家的森林得到了很多环保人士的关注，原因显而易见。

examination_example.sentence: I can <highlight>see</highlight> what you mean.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我明白你的意思。

sense_info_list.en: be the time or place when something happens

examination_example.sentence: While the public <highlight>sees</highlight> greater workplace equality between men and women now than it did 20-30 years ago, most believe more change is needed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与二三十年前相比，现在的职场中更讲究男女平等。尽管如此，大多数人仍然认为这还远远不够。

examination_example.sentence: But anyway, I'll send him an email to request a meeting, and I'll <highlight>see</highlight> what happens from there.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但无论如何，我会给他发邮件要求会面，然后我再看会发生什么。

examination_example.sentence: Some parts of the world have <highlight>seen</highlight> successful implementation of family planning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 世界上一些地区已经成功地实施了计划生育。

examination_example.sentence: It doesn't take donations and doesn't want to be <highlight>seen</highlight> as a charity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它不接受捐赠，也不想被视为慈善机构。

examination_example.sentence: Mike is <highlight>seen</highlight> as hope for the future of the town, the country and the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 迈克被视为这个城镇、国家和世界未来前景的希望。

examination_example.sentence: Others <highlight>saw</highlight> them as politically correct and morally appropriate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他人认为他们在政治上是正确的，在道德上是恰当的。

examination_example.sentence: The scientists wanted to <highlight>see</highlight> whether the mice would continue doing the same kinds of activities they were observed doing on Earth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家们想确认这些老鼠是否会继续做在地球上观察到的同样的活动。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>see</highlight> whether people hold doors open for strangers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看看人们是否会对陌生人敞开心扉。

examination_example.sentence: In fall 2010, she helped launch a pilot project in Chicago to <highlight>see</highlight> if the iPad could improve working conditions and patient care.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2010年秋天，她帮助在芝加哥启动了一个试点项目，确认iPad能否改善工作条件和病人护理。

examination_example.sentence: But I need to <highlight>see</highlight> him, because my friends and I lent him some money last month.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是我需要拜访他，因为我和我的朋友上个月借给了他一些钱。

examination_example.sentence: The old age pensioner was on a mission to <highlight>see</highlight> the Popeh and decided to make his way there by car.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这位年长的养老金领取者正在执行一项拜访教皇的任务，并决定开车前往那里。

examination_example.sentence: What do we learn about the man who came to <highlight>see</highlight> the woman yesterday?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于昨天来见女人的那个男人，我们了解到什么？

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>See</highlight>, I did think it was a bit weird for him to be asking for money for that sort of thing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看，我确实觉得他做这种事要钱有点奇怪。

examination_example.sentence: You <highlight>see</highlight> in America, many cities don't have good public transport.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你看，在美国，很多城市没有很好的公共交通。

examination_example.sentence: You <highlight>see</highlight>, our language makes a difference, and how we refer to things matters because it affects our thinking and therefore our actions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你看，我们的语言会产生影响，我们如何看待事物很重要，因为它会影响我们的思维，进而影响我们的行动。

examination_example.sentence: I can't <highlight>see</highlight> myself getting an opportunity to progress at my company anytime in the near future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我看不到自己在不远的未来有机会在公司取得进步。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>see</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我明白了。

word_usage.usage: see, watch, look at都有“看”的意思。see侧重“看”的结果，而后前者侧重“看”的动作和过程。

see表“看见”时，是瞬间的动作，一般不用进行时；而watch也表示“看”，可用于进行时。
我临窗站着，望着人们匆匆走过。
误 I stood by the window, seeing people passing by in a hurry.
正 I stood by the window, watching people passing by in a hurry.

see既可用作不及物动词，也可用作及物动词；其宾语后接不定式时，不带to。see处于被动语态时，后面所接的不定式带to。
有人看见那贼走进一家杂货店。
误 The thief was seen come into a grocery.
正 The thief was seen to come into a grocery.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 理解; 明白; 领会

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: You can <highlight>see</highlight> the bathroom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以看到浴室。

examination_example.sentence: We haven't <highlight>seen</highlight> them for ages.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们好久没见到他们了。

examination_example.sentence: Without even <highlight>seeing</highlight> the menu, I knew I'd be ordering every tomato on it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不看菜单，我都知道我会点上所有含有番茄的菜品。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>see</highlight> how many facilities they can use.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看看他们能使用多少设施。

examination_example.sentence: I'd <highlight>see</highlight> how a factory worked .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想看看工厂是如何运作的。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>see</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我明白了。

examination_example.sentence: Would you like to <highlight>see</highlight> them?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你想看看吗？

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>see</highlight> a friend.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去见一位朋友。

examination_example.sentence: Other cattlemen <highlight>see</highlight> more promise in robots.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他养牛人认为机器人更有前途。

examination_example.sentence: It was a mistake to <highlight>see</highlight> the arts as unnecessary, he added.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他补充道，认为艺术没有必要这种观点是错误的。

examination_example.sentence: Salah Sukkarieh, a professor at the University of Sydney, <highlight>sees</highlight> robots as necessary given how cattlemen are aging.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 悉尼大学的Salah Sukkarieh教授认为，考虑到养牛人的年龄增长，机器人很有必要。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>See</highlight> a movie.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看电影。

examination_example.sentence: One day, I <highlight>saw</highlight> a commercial for a health-care company.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一天，我看到一家医疗保健公司的广告。

sense_info_list.zh: 理解; 明白; 领会

examination_example.sentence: We will <highlight>see</highlight> that social factors (因素) like gender, race, and class do not determine the appearance of genius.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们会发现，社会因素（比如性别，种族和阶级）并不能决定天才的出现。

examination_example.sentence: We begin to <highlight>see</highlight> the interconnectedness of one thing to another in all aspects of our life, of ourselves and the universe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我们生活的各个方面，我们开始看到一件事与另一件事的相互联系，我们自己和宇宙。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>See</highlight> you tomorrow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 明天见。

word_usage.usage:
see后可跟由不带to的不定式构成的复合结构，如：
You look so well. I've never seen you look so well before.
你看上去很健康，我以前从未见过你这样健康。
但在被动结构中，不定式应带to，如：
He was seen to enter the lab last night.
昨天晚上有人看见他进过实验室。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 理解; 领会; 看待

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 看到；看见；领悟；理解；看望；探望；意外遇见；护送；与…下同样赌注

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 看电影；去看电影；看场电影

examination_example.sentence: We will never <highlight>see</highlight> Kobe play another basketball game, but we will always remember him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们再也看不到科比打篮球赛了，但我们会永远记住他。

examination_example.sentence: Readers always enjoy <highlight>seeing</highlight> poor people rise and succeed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 读者总是喜欢看到穷人崭露头角并取得成功。

examination_example.sentence: Wherever I go, I <highlight>see</highlight> people greet him warmly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论我走到哪里，我都会看到人们热情地迎接他。

examination_example.sentence: I haven't <highlight>seen</highlight> you for days.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我好几天没见到你了。

examination_example.sentence: Glad to <highlight>see</highlight> you today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很高兴今天见到你。

examination_example.sentence: Have you <highlight>seen</highlight> a doctor?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你看过医生吗？

examination_example.sentence: Homestays offer cheap places to stay and the chance for guests to <highlight>see</highlight> the area like local people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 寄宿家庭提供了廉价的住宿场所，并为客人提供了像当地人一样参观该地区的机会。

examination_example.sentence: She was just back from <highlight>seeing</highlight> the Great Wall of China.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她刚看过中国长城回来。

examination_example.sentence: This way, you can <highlight>see</highlight> almost every place of interest of London.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样，你几乎可以看到伦敦的每一个名胜古迹。

examination_example.sentence: Wait and <highlight>see</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 走着瞧。

examination_example.sentence: He wanted to <highlight>see</highlight> which animal would find them first.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他想看看哪种动物会先找到它们。

examination_example.sentence: Then we check our mobiles from time to time during the meal, to <highlight>see</highlight> whether we get "liked"or not.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后我们在用餐时不时地查看我们的手机，看看自己有没有被“喜欢”（点赞）。

sense_info_list.zh: 理解; 领会; 看待

examination_example.sentence: Though it was dark, he could <highlight>see</highlight> she needed help．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然天很黑，但他能看出来她需要帮助。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>see</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我明白了。

examination_example.sentence: Luckily, my grandfather <highlight>saw</highlight> things in another way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 幸运的是，我的祖父以另一种方式看待事情。

examination_example.sentence: How did I <highlight>see</highlight> my father?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我是怎么见到我父亲的？

examination_example.sentence: You'd better take them to <highlight>see</highlight> a veterinarian in an animal hospital.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你最好带他们去动物医院看兽医。

examination_example.sentence: Soon Alex's parents came to <highlight>see</highlight> him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不久，亚力克斯的父母来看他。

word_usage.usage: see, watch, look at都有“看”的意思。see侧重“看”的结果，而后前者侧重“看”的动作和过程。

see表“看见”时，是瞬间的动作，一般不用进行时；而watch也表示“看”，可用于进行时。
我临窗站着，望着人们匆匆走过。
误 I stood by the window, seeing people passing by in a hurry.
正 I stood by the window, watching people passing by in a hurry.

see既可用作不及物动词，也可用作及物动词；其宾语后接不定式时，不带to。see处于被动语态时，后面所接的不定式带to。
有人看见那贼走进一家杂货店。
误 The thief was seen come into a grocery.
正 The thief was seen to come into a grocery.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 侧重短暂的看的动作，但并不一定能看见，有时用来唤起别人的注意。
侧重看的结果；也指眼睛看得见或观看比赛、电视节目等。
指在一段时间内关注某人或某事，以便对每一个变化、运动等进行观察。
常用词，含义广泛，既可指接受他人来访，又可指去访问他人。
正式用词，强调出于工作需要的访问，也指亲戚朋友间的看望。
